old:
ぎゃぎゃぎゃーー！！　ニンゲン！？
何し二キタ！
speaker: Baranja

old:
ぎゃぎゃっ！！
王の物、無くす怒らレル！！
column2:
Geez!
The king's things are lost!
speaker: Baranja

old:
オデ怒られるイヤ！！
アレどこ行っタ――アレ、アレ
column2:
Orc is angry.
Where did that go―― That, that
speaker: Baranja

old:
ばばばば！！　タイヘン！
アブナイデカイ魔物　来ル夢　ミタ！！
食われル怖イ！
column2:
Ba-ba-ba-ba!　Oh, no!
I had a dream that a huge monster was coming!
I'm afraid of being eaten!
speaker: Baranja
